pageContent: Introduction: This study aimed to evaluate the risk of complications for patients who received periprosthetic nerve block (PPNB) with one percent lignocaine before transrectal ultrasonography (TRUS) biopsy of the prostate.

metaData.source:
Salvage partial gland ablation for recurrent prostate cancer following primary partial gland ablation: Functional and oncological outcomes
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35537905/
